meanings.definition: A competitive motorsport event in which drivers navigate a defined course in the shortest amount of time.
meanings.sent1: At the autocross, drivers race through a marked path to see who is the fastest.
meanings.sent2: The autocross competition brought together skilled drivers aiming to complete the course swiftly.
meanings.sent3: During the autocross, the racers zipped around the cones like busy bees in a hive.
meanings.sent4: The autocross was a thrilling maze of speed and precision, like a dance with the track.
meanings.sent5: The autocross track was a blur of excitement as cars zoomed past spectators.

meanings.definition: To participate in a competitive autocross event.
meanings.sent1: She decided to autocross for the first time and felt the adrenaline rush.
meanings.sent2: They autocrossed with enthusiasm, eager to test their driving skills.
meanings.sent3: Autocrossing on the weekend became their favorite hobby, a thrilling adventure.
meanings.sent4: He autocrossed through the course like a skilled driver in a high-speed chase.
meanings.sent5: The friends autocrossed together, enjoying the friendly competition and speed.

meanings.definition: The act of driving a vehicle through a designated autocross course.
meanings.sent1: His autocross through the track was smooth and precise, impressing the spectators.
meanings.sent2: The autocross of the vintage car showcased the driver's control and speed.
meanings.sent3: Autocrossing in the rain turned the course into a slippery adventure.
meanings.sent4: The autocross of the sports car was like a symphony of engine roars and tire screeches.
meanings.sent5: The driver's autocross was a display of skill and agility on the challenging course.
